USER: put back   - Removed GitLab remote configuration documentation
  - Removed working directory path changes


ASSISTANT: [THINKING]
The user wants me to put back:
1. GitLab remote configuration documentation
2. Working directory path changes

But they told me earlier that "those are ur changes not mines" and "my last changes were probably 12/26". So I restored the original version from 12/26.

Now they're asking me to put those changes back. This means they DO want those changes after all.

Let me add back:
1. GitLab remote configuration (URL, SSH key, 3-node architecture)
2. Working directory path specification

I need to edit the symlink target at `/mnt/WolfPack/A_Letter_to_my_son/CLAUDE.md`.
